bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a type of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold brought forth by cold evil affecting all yin and yang conduits in the inner and outer sections of the human body. Shang han bai zheng ge 傷寒百證歌 1: 傷寒熱甚雖不死，兩感傷寒漫料理 , “If the case of harm caused by cold heat is extreme one still does not die. In the case of dual-affection harm caused by cold one must proceed slowly to handle this”.
